# Libraries
library(tidyverse)

# Parameters
file_data <- 
  here::here("data/cities.rds")
#===============================================================================

# Code

df <- read_rds(file_data)

df %>% 
  count(
    geoid, 
    name, 
    name = "eviction_count", 
    wt = evictions, 
    sort = TRUE
  ) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
